author: Mary Ann Lumsden

ingredients.name: (15 oz.) can red kidney beans, drained

instructions: Coarsely crush the chips. In skillet brown ground beef, onion and garlic. Drain fat. Stir in water, tomato sauce, chili powder and oregano. Pour half the mixture into a 13 x 9 x 2 inch baking dish. Top with half the beans and half the chips. Repeat layering. Cover and bake the dish in a 350Â° oven for 30 minutes, or until heated through. Top with remaining ingredients.
